name: PengiunFishDelivery
0:
”Alexa, open Penguin Fish Delivery”
”Alexa, start Penguin Fish Delivery”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: penguin fish delivery
des:
This is the world of Antarctica, where there is ice all around.
The baby penguin is asked by the mama penguin to catch the fish.
It is difficult to move on the slippery ice.
You have to tell the baby penguin which direction to go and help him catch the fish and bring them to the mama penguin!
There are more than 200 stages to play. Let's try to clear all of them!

◆The type of Echo device to execute the skill (with or without a screen)

The games you can play differ depending on whether the Echo device you want to use the skill on has a screen or not.

------------------------------------------------
In case of activation from Echo without a screen

Start the skill in "Cave Mode" and start the game.
Tell the baby penguin which direction to move from "North", "South", "East", or "West".
Hearing the sound of the baby penguin's movement, you will get fish and bring them to the mama penguin.
In the "Cave Mode," you do not know the terrain of the stage or even where the fish and mama penguin are.
The key to clearing the stage is to take notes and clarify the terrain of the cave.
------------------------------------------------
In case of activation from Echo with a screen

Activate the skill in normal mode. Refer to the following instructions to successfully complete the baby penguin's quest.

About the menu :
When the skill is activated, the menu screen will appears.
The main operations on the menu screen are as follows.

Start
Switches to the stage selection screen.
On the stage selection screen, tap the icon of the stage you wish to play or say "Start Stage ○".
The game will begin at the selected stage.

World Select
Go to the world selection screen.
You can change the world where the game will be played.
Note: World selection is not available at the beginning. You will be able to select the world as the game progresses.

How to Play
Slides explaining how to play the game can be viewed.

How to operate the game :
You can choose "Up", "Down", "Right", or "Left" to move the baby penguin.
The baby penguin moves in the indicated direction. Once it starts moving, it will keep sliding until it hits an obstacle or reaches the edge of the stage.
The stage is cleared when the little penguin is able to get the fish in the stage and bring them to the mama penguin.

About energy: 
When the little penguins move, the energy gradually decreases.
When the energy runs out, the baby penguin cannot play the game anymore.
The energy will be restored after you finish a skill and wait for a while.

How to end a skill: 
You can end a skill by saying "End" or "Stop".

When the screen is displayed halfway through
　Depending on network conditions and other factors, the screen may be displayed only halfway through.
　In this case, try saying "Go to menu screen" to move the screen.
------------------------------------------------
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
